croco.lib package¶

Submodules¶

croco.lib.DynamXL module¶

Functions to write DynamXL data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.DynamXL.Write(xtable, outpath)[source]¶

Converts xTable data into cross-link information file for the dynamXL analysis software:

K189 NZ K192 NZ 18 K189 NZ K196 NZ 5 K200 NZ K192 NZ 1 K236 NZ K189 NZ 3

dynamxl.chem.ox.ac.uk

Params:xtable data table structure
Params:outpath_ path to write file

croco.lib.Kojak module¶

Functions to read Kojak data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.Kojak.Read(kojak_file, rawfile=None)[source]¶

reads pLink results file and returns an xtable data array.

Params:koajk_file: path to Kojak results file
Params:rawfile: name of the corresponding rawfile
Returns:xtable data table
croco.lib.Kojak.calc_pos_from_xpos(xpos, xlink)[source]¶

Calculates the absolute position of the first AA of a peptide sequence from the absolute position of the cross-link AA (xpos) its position within the sequence (xlink)

Returns: pos - Absolute position of AA in sequence

croco.lib.Kojak.init(this_order)[source]¶

Set required variables for conversion

croco.lib.Kojak.process_kojak_peptide(peptide_string)[source]¶

Return Modifications and the peptide sequence from a Kojak sequence string such as M[15.99]TDSKYFTTNK

croco.lib.Kojak.process_kojak_protein(protein_string)[source]¶

Return protein name and absolute cross-link position from a kojak string such as sp|P07340|AT1B1_RAT Sodium/potassium-transporting ATPase subunit beta-1 OS=Rattus norvegicus GN=Atp1(13);

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.Manual.ReadManual(filepath)[source]¶

Read Excel file with hand-curated results

croco.lib.Manual.init(this_order)[source]¶

Set required variables for conversion

croco.lib.Manual.process_plink_proteins(prot_string)[source]¶

Extract protein name and absolute cross-link position from pLink protein string e.g. sp|P63045|VAMP2_RAT(79)-sp|P63045|VAMP2_RAT(59)

croco.lib.Manual.process_plink_sequence(seq_string)[source]¶

Extract peptide sequences and cross-link positions from pLink sequence string e.g. YVPTAGKLTVVILEAK(7)-LTVVILEAK(2):1

Returns:list of pepseq1, pepseq2, xpos1, xpos2, xtype
croco.lib.Manual.process_plink_spectrum(spec_string)[source]¶

Extract rawfile name, precursor charge and scan no from pLink sequence string

Returns:list of rawfile, scanno, prec_chManual.init()

croco.lib.pLink1 module¶

Functions to read pLink1 data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.pLink1.Read(plinkdir)[source]¶

reads pLink report dir and returns an xtabel data array.

Params:plinkdir: plink report subdir (e.g. sample1)
Returns:xtable data table
Returns:xinfo meta-data object

Set required variables for conversion

croco.lib.pLink1.plinkpeptide2pandas(filepath)[source]¶

Read a pLink peptide results file and return a pandas dictionary

Params:filepath: Path to a pLink results file e.g. _inter_combine.peptide.xls
Returns:pandas dataframe
croco.lib.pLink1.plinkprotein2pandas(filepath)[source]¶

Read a pLink protein results file and return a pandas dictionary

Params:filepath: Path to a pLink results file e.g. _inter_combine.protein.xls
Returns:pandas dataframe

Returns:pandas dataframe

croco.lib.pLink1.process_plink_sequence(seq_string)[source]¶

Returns:list of pepseq1, pepseq2, xpos1, xpos2, xtype

croco.lib.pLink1.read_plink_modifications(filepath)[source]¶

Open a pLink modification.ini file and extract all modifications with their names as dict.

Params:filepath: Path to modifications.ini
Returns:mod_dict: Dict mapping names to masses

croco.lib.pLink2 module¶

Read pLink2 files @author: aretaon

croco.lib.pLink2.Read(plinkdir)[source]¶

reads pLink2 report dir and returns an xtabel data array.

Parameters:plinkdir – plink2 reports subdir (reports)
Returns:xtable data table
Returns:xinfo meta-data object
croco.lib.pLink2.calculate_abs_pos(row)[source]¶

Return the absolute position of the first AA of both peptides. If only one peptide present (mono-link) return NaN for the second position

croco.lib.pLink2.init(this_order)[source]¶

Set required variables for conversion

croco.lib.pLink2.plink2peptide2pandas(filepath)[source]¶

Read a pLink peptide results file and return a pandas dictionary

Parameters:filepath – Path to a pLink results file e.g. _inter_combine.peptide.xls
Returns:pandas dataframe
croco.lib.pLink2.process_plink2_proteins(row)[source]¶

Extract protein name and absolute cross-link position from pLink protein string e.g. sp|P63045|VAMP2_RAT(79)-sp|P63045|VAMP2_RAT(59)

croco.lib.pLink2.process_plink2_sequence(row)[source]¶

Extract peptide sequences and cross-link positions from pLink sequence string e.g. YVPTAGKLTVVILEAK(7)-LTVVILEAK(2):1 Can differentiate between mono, loop and cross-link information

Parameters:row – a row of a dataframe with headers ‘Peptide’ and ‘type’
Returns:list of pepseq1, pepseq2, xpos1, xpos2, xtype
croco.lib.pLink2.process_plink2_title(spec_string)[source]¶

Extract rawfile name, precursor charge and scan no from pLink sequence string

Returns:list of rawfile, scanno, prec_ch
croco.lib.pLink2.read_plink_modifications(filepath)[source]¶

Open a pLink modification.ini file and extract all modifications with their names as dict.

Params:filepath: Path to modifications.ini
Returns:mod_dict: Dict mapping names to masses

Set required variables for conversion

croco.lib.xQuest.process_xQuest_Id(Id_string)[source]¶

Extract peptide sequence of the alpha (longer) and the beta (shorter) peptide as well as the relative positions of the cross-links within these sequences from an xQuest Id-string

croco.lib.xQuest.process_xQuest_spectrum(spec_string)[source]¶

Extract rawfile name, precursor charge and scan no from xQuest sequence string

Returns:list of rawfile, scanno, prec_ch

croco.lib.xTable module¶

Functions to write xTable data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.xTable.Write(xtable, outpath)[source]¶

writes an xtable data structure to file (in xtable format)

Params:xtable: data table structure
Params:outpath to write file (w/o file extension!)

croco.lib.xVis module¶

Functions to write xWalk data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.xVis.Write(xtable, outpath)[source]¶

Converts xtable data structure to cross-link data file for xVis data visualisation tool (https://xvis.genzentrum.lmu.de/CrossVisNoLogin.php)

Params:xtable: data table structure
Params:outpath: path to write file

croco.lib.xWalk module¶

Functions to write xWalk data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.xWalk.Write(xtable, outpath)[source]¶

Converts xTable into a list format that can be used as input for the xWalk web-server at http://www.xwalk.org/cgi-bin/home.cgi

Format is:

residue # residue #

As xWalk can only validate one protein at a time, the function generates several oouput files for all intra-protein cross-links

Params:xtable: data table structure
Params:outpath: path to write file
croco.lib.xWalk.alphanum_string(s)[source]¶

Method to clean strings from incorrect characters for file output

croco.lib.xiNET module¶

Functions to write xWalk data.

This script is part of the CroCo cross-link converter project

croco.lib.xiNET.Write(xtable, outpath)[source]¶

Converts xtable data structure to cross-link data file for xiNET data visualisation tool (http://crosslinkviewer.org)

Params:xtable: data table structure
Params:outpath: path to write file
